synonyms.synonym: Deafness locus-associated putative guanine nucleotide exchange factor

protein.specific_function: Probable guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF), which may be involved in the secretion process

reference.reference_text: Uhlmann J, Wiemann S, Ponstingl H: DelGEF, an RCC1-related protein encoded by a gene on chromosome 11p14 critical for two forms of hereditary deafness. FEBS Lett. 1999 Oct 22;460(1):153-60.
